name: Summer Sunshine Bouquet
description: A vibrant collection of sunflowers, yellow roses, and seasonal greens that captures the essence of summer. Perfect for brightening any space with natural warmth.
careInstructions: Trim stems at an angle, change water every 2-3 days, keep in cool location away from direct sunlight.

name: Romantic Rose Arrangement
description: An elegant arrangement of deep red roses with baby's breath and eucalyptus. Hand-picked from our fields for maximum freshness and beauty.
careInstructions: Remove lower leaves, cut stems underwater, use flower food provided, replace water every 2 days.

name: Wildflower Meadow Mix
description: A rustic collection of wildflowers including lavender, chamomile, and poppies. Brings the beauty of our meadows directly to your home.
careInstructions: Gentle handling required, trim stems regularly, mist lightly, keep in cool water.

name: White Lily Elegance
description: Pure white lilies with their intoxicating fragrance. Perfect for special occasions or as a thoughtful gift.
careInstructions: Remove pollen carefully, trim stems every few days, keep water fresh and cool.

name: Tulip Garden Bundle
description: A dozen fresh tulips in mixed spring colors. Grown in our greenhouse for year-round availability.
careInstructions: Cut stems short, use shallow water, keep in cool location, stems will continue to grow.

name: Lavender Herb Plant
description: Organic lavender plant in a rustic terracotta pot. Perfect for windowsills and adds natural fragrance to your home.
careInstructions: Water when soil is dry, provide plenty of sunlight, prune after flowering for continued growth.

name: Herb Garden Starter Kit
description: Collection of four essential herbs: basil, rosemary, thyme, and sage. Everything you need to start your kitchen garden.
careInstructions: Water regularly but don't overwater, place in sunny location, harvest regularly to encourage growth.

name: Seasonal Farm Bundle
description: Our farmer's choice selection of the best seasonal flowers currently blooming. Changes with the seasons for maximum freshness.
careInstructions: Follow specific care instructions provided with each variety, generally keep cool and hydrated.

name: Peony Paradise
description: Luxurious peonies in full bloom. Available in limited quantities during peak season for the most spectacular display.
careInstructions: Handle gently, cut stems at sharp angle, use lukewarm water, keep away from heat sources.

name: Succulent Garden
description: Variety of small succulents arranged in a decorative wooden box. Low maintenance and perfect for any space.
careInstructions: Water sparingly, provide bright indirect light, ensure good drainage, minimal maintenance required.

name: Autumn Harvest Bouquet
description: Warm autumn colors featuring chrysanthemums, marigolds, and orange roses with seasonal foliage.
careInstructions: Remove wilted blooms, change water frequently, trim stems every few days for longevity.

name: Orchid Elegance
description: Beautiful white orchid in a modern ceramic pot. A sophisticated addition to any home or office space.
careInstructions: Water weekly with ice cubes, provide bright indirect light, maintain humidity, fertilize monthly.
